sense.def:
A muscle
je telesni del, ki se lahko krči ali sprošča in tako omogoča gibanje.

seg.quote: The boys couldn't help admiring their bulging muscles.
Your mouth is mainly composed of muscle.
The campaign was valueless without the muscle of an organisation behind it.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
muscles in on something
, si utre dostop tudi tja, kjer ni dobrodošel.

seg.quote: They resent the way you are muscling in on their territory.
